Estrategico, reflejos y jugar con equipo

At this point, CS:GO is fairly dated as far as mechanics go and feels odd to return to after playing a more modern shooter: however, once you get used to the lack of a sprint control and ADS, the game-play is still fun. The simplicity is ultimately what makes for a satisfying twitch based "tactical" arcade-like shooter experience, stripped of all the bells and whistles that can tend to over complicate more modern entries like RS: Siege or Insurgency.  If a lean, mean shooter is what you are looking for, this is it chief. Pay for it if you want better match making.
